game.confirm_pass:
Are you sure you want to pass?
Note that you must fill all neutral points (Chinese Ruleset).

sign_up.display_help: You can still change this later on.

rank.r15k: (15k) I know the rules and played a few times on the big board
rank.r10k: (10k) At the club many are still stronger than me

forgot_password.instructions: Instructions for resetting your password have been emailed to you.

ratings.header: How does the rating system work?

text.p1: We use Glicko-2 as rating system. On top of that we bundle game results in rating periods of several days/weeks.
text.p2: The displayed rank/rating is based on a projection of the current rating period.

text.p1: weiqi.gs is fully open source, which means anyone who wishes to contribute has the chance to do so.
text.p2: Even if you are not a programmer, there are many ways to contribute. If you are interested please check our GitHub repository for more information.

text.p1: Please report all bugs on our issue tracker on GitHub.
text.p2: Please also check if there is already an existing issue covering this problem before opening a new one.

text.p1: If you have an idea for improvements or new features you can create an issue on our issue tracker on GitHub.
text.p2: Please check if there is already an existing issue for your idea before opening a new one.

avatar.header: Why do I have this profile picture?
avatar.text: For every user a unique Identicon is generated. If the user has not uploaded his or her own profile picture the identicon will be displayed instead.

avatar.confirm_delete:
Are you sure you want to DELETE your profile picture?

Note that you cannot delete your default picture.
avatar.crop_help: You can move and zoom your picture to your liking. Everything outside the highlighted box will be cropped.

password_reset_confirm.sent: An email with your new password has been sent to you.
password_reset_confirm.failed: This link is not valid anymore.

disconnected.header: Oops, looks like we lost connection ...
disconnected.body:
Somehow we got disconnected from the server.
You can refresh the page and retry, or wait here until the server is available again.
